rules_text:
[i]Dragon Steward[/i] – Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Verdant Faith [/i]– {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter onto each creature you control that entered the battlefield this turn.
Partner with Framme, Eager Steward [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Framme into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
